data.what_is: Ricochet360 is the All-in-One Auto Dialer, CRM/Lead Management, and Marketing Automation Platform designed for both inbound & outbound agents looking for a competitive advantage by enabling them to call a new lead in one second, nurture and engage prospects throughout the entire sales process, and automate 95% of their daily workflows.
data.product_description: Ricochet360 is an all-on-one dialer, CRM and marketing automation platform.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ricochet360?
I like using this software because it helps to grow my management team, and its automation helped us raise more and reach my audience smoothly. It enables us to manage and maintain all the data and allows us to analyze it.

What do you dislike about Ricochet360?
Mainly do not dislike this product; it looks a little hard to understand for starting phase, but once we learn it's functional, it's beneficial. One point is this product seems costly.

What problems is Ricochet360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Ricochet360 is solving my automation calling issues and analysis and helping me to grow my marketing strategies. It reduces my time and effort to achieve the targets.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Ricochet360?
review_question_answers.answer: I like using this software because it helps to grow my management team, and its automation helped us raise more and reach my audience smoothly. It enables us to manage and maintain all the data and allows us to analyze it.

review_question_answers.answer: Mainly do not dislike this product; it looks a little hard to understand for starting phase, but once we learn it's functional, it's beneficial. One point is this product seems costly.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Ricochet360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Ricochet360 is solving my automation calling issues and analysis and helping me to grow my marketing strategies. It reduces my time and effort to achieve the targets.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ricochet360?
Ricochet360 allows users to capture, track, and manage leads from various sources. It provides lead distribution and routing capabilities, ensuring that leads are assigned to the right sales representatives in real-time.

What do you dislike about Ricochet360?
Reporting and Analytics . Need to improve in report and analytics

What problems is Ricochet360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Integrations: Ricochet360 often supports integrations with other business applications and services. These integrations allow for seamless data exchange and workflow synchronization between the CRM platform and other tools used in the sales and marketing ecosystem.

initial_reviews.review_title: When it comes to automating your sales process, Ricochet360 leaves no stone unturned
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ricochet360?
I can now make calls, send text messages and tend to my emails with minimal person-hours.

What do you dislike about Ricochet360?
If any at all, it would be the subscription plans

What problems is Ricochet360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
The key challenge ricochet360 solves for my organization is saving us lag time in attending to our sales funnel by automating workflows.

initial_reviews.review_title: Why Ricochet360 is the Ultimate Sales Solution: A Critical Review
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ricochet360?
Real-time analytics: Ricochet360 provides real-time analytics and reporting, giving businesses insight into their sales performance and allowing them to make data-driven decisions.

What do you dislike about Ricochet360?
Complexity: Ricochet360 can be complex and may require some time to learn and set up properly, which could be a downside for smaller businesses with limited resources.

What problems is Ricochet360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Lead Management: Ricochet360 helps businesses manage leads effectively by automatically routing leads to the right sales agents and providing a centralized platform to manage and track leads.

initial_reviews.review_title: Absolutely best tool for automation of my Telemarketing needs.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ricochet360?
Well, it is really easy for us to automate our marketing efforts which involve constant touch with the US audience. Before we were overwhelmed with our work as all the work we did was scatterred in places. Having this tool have ahlped us save huge chunk of time.. We are talking 40% ..

What do you dislike about Ricochet360?
Well, there are very less reasons I dislike Ricochet360 ... One of them is that is this tool is pretty costly. However, it pays itself if you have a good marketing team and know how to use all its features.

What problems is Ricochet360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
It has many features like Spam Guru, expert Lead management, and marketing automation. But I am a fan that how I don't have to teach my sales staff to pick up this software and start using in not more than a half an hour call.

Before we were overwhelmed with our work as all the work we did was scatterred in places. Having this tool have ahlped us save huge chunk of time.. We are talking 40% ..

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Ricochet360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: It has many features like Spam Guru, expert Lead management, and marketing automation. But I am a fan that how I don't have to teach my sales staff to pick up this software and start using in not more than a half an hour call.

initial_reviews.review_title: Good Service But There are Better Options
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ricochet360?
I like that the system automatically dials a list of numbers for you.  It saves you time on that aspect.

What do you dislike about Ricochet360?
I don't like the fact that the system doesn't dial multiple numbers at once to increase your potential of reaching a live person.

What problems is Ricochet360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
It saves you valuable time by auto-dialing outbound numbers.  It also limits the turnover of staff because the system makes the outbound calls for you rather than an  employee manually making those calls

initial_reviews.review_title: Very Good CRM dialer with exceptional customer service
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ricochet360?
I started using Ricochet360 back in 2018 and used it for 3 years. It's a stunning software. It facilitated my entire team to call a fresh lead in less than a second and then robotically looked after and appoint prospects right through the entire sales progression.

What do you dislike about Ricochet360?
My experience with Ricochet260 has been great though I have heard concerns from some other individuals who switched from this to something like CallFire etc due to the "not so attractive pricing" as well as the setup of this can be tedious.

Recommendations to others considering Ricochet360:
Before switching to Ricochet360, consider the pricing and your affordability (considering the turnover of your business) and their support staff will take care of everything once you are on the ship.

What problems is Ricochet360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
My work phone is almost as good as useless, due to Ricochet360 since I can make a call from my workstation directly. Moreover, I found my efficiency to have increased a bit like the ability to automate all the processes like emails, voicemails, texts etc has immensely helped me.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Ricochet360?
review_question_answers.answer: I started using Ricochet360 back in 2018 and used it for 3 years. It's a stunning software. It facilitated my entire team to call a fresh lead in less than a second and then robotically looked after and appoint prospects right through the entire sales progression.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Ricochet360?
review_question_answers.answer: My experience with Ricochet260 has been great though I have heard concerns from some other individuals who switched from this to something like CallFire etc due to the "not so attractive pricing" as well as the setup of this can be tedious.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Ricochet360:
review_question_answers.answer: Before switching to Ricochet360, consider the pricing and your affordability (considering the turnover of your business) and their support staff will take care of everything once you are on the ship.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Ricochet360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: My work phone is almost as good as useless, due to Ricochet360 since I can make a call from my workstation directly. Moreover, I found my efficiency to have increased a bit like the ability to automate all the processes like emails, voicemails, texts etc has immensely helped me.

initial_reviews.review_title: A unique CRM and phone system
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ricochet360?
That it has almost everything in one box, you get a CRM, Phone system, Marketing platform, sending texts and emails, reporting, and managing your phone numbers and caller-ID for the inside.

What do you dislike about Ricochet360?
The reports for texting it is not complete yet.

Recommendations to others considering Ricochet360:
Make sure that you have everything ready if you are porting your numbers over to Ricochet.

What problems is Ricochet360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
When you have it all in one place, no parts will break if you had to bridge them together with a third-party software.

review_question_answers.answer: When you have it all in one place, no parts will break if you had to bridge them together with a third-party software.

What do you like best about Ricochet360?
I like that the system automatically dials a list of numbers for you.  It saves you time on that aspect.

What do you dislike about Ricochet360?
I don't like the fact that the system doesn't dial multiple numbers at once to increase your potential of reaching a live person.

What problems is Ricochet360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
It saves you valuable time by auto-dialing outbound numbers.  It also limits the turnover of staff because the system makes the outbound calls for you rather than an  employee manually making those calls

all_reviews.review_title: Very Good CRM dialer with exceptional customer service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ricochet360?
I started using Ricochet360 back in 2018 and used it for 3 years. It's a stunning software. It facilitated my entire team to call a fresh lead in less than a second and then robotically looked after and appoint prospects right through the entire sales progression.

What do you dislike about Ricochet360?
My experience with Ricochet260 has been great though I have heard concerns from some other individuals who switched from this to something like CallFire etc due to the "not so attractive pricing" as well as the setup of this can be tedious.

Recommendations to others considering Ricochet360:
Before switching to Ricochet360, consider the pricing and your affordability (considering the turnover of your business) and their support staff will take care of everything once you are on the ship.

What problems is Ricochet360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
My work phone is almost as good as useless, due to Ricochet360 since I can make a call from my workstation directly. Moreover, I found my efficiency to have increased a bit like the ability to automate all the processes like emails, voicemails, texts etc has immensely helped me.

review_question_answers.answer: I started using Ricochet360 back in 2018 and used it for 3 years. It's a stunning software. It facilitated my entire team to call a fresh lead in less than a second and then robotically looked after and appoint prospects right through the entire sales progression.

review_question_answers.answer: My experience with Ricochet260 has been great though I have heard concerns from some other individuals who switched from this to something like CallFire etc due to the "not so attractive pricing" as well as the setup of this can be tedious.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Ricochet360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: My work phone is almost as good as useless, due to Ricochet360 since I can make a call from my workstation directly. Moreover, I found my efficiency to have increased a bit like the ability to automate all the processes like emails, voicemails, texts etc has immensely helped me.

all_reviews.review_title: A unique CRM and phone system
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ricochet360?
That it has almost everything in one box, you get a CRM, Phone system, Marketing platform, sending texts and emails, reporting, and managing your phone numbers and caller-ID for the inside.

What do you dislike about Ricochet360?
The reports for texting it is not complete yet.

Recommendations to others considering Ricochet360:
Make sure that you have everything ready if you are porting your numbers over to Ricochet.

What problems is Ricochet360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
When you have it all in one place, no parts will break if you had to bridge them together with a third-party software.
